content.body: Sorry if I ask something wrong.

Luke Warlow: https://dontcallmedom.github.io/webdex/ is the is tool I had been trying to remember the other day — in regard to finding which other specs reference the “XML fragment serialization algorithm” term
content.formatted_body: Luke Warlow: https://dontcallmedom.github.io/webdex/ is the is tool I had been trying to remember the other day — in regard to finding which other specs reference the “XML fragment serialization algorithm” term

content.body: and “XML fragment serialization algorithm ” is not in that index — which I think confirms that no other specs normatively reference it
yeah, even the DOM Parsing reference isn’t in there — because that one is in a non-normative Note. I guess the tool’s smart enough to know the difference
